org.jogger
Class RouterMiddleware

java.lang.Object
  org.jogger.RouterMiddleware
All Implemented Interfaces:
Middleware
public class RouterMiddleware
extends Object
implements Middleware

This middleware routes requests through interceptors and controller actions using the routes provided by the user.

Author:
German Escobar

RouterMiddleware

public RouterMiddleware()
Method Detail

handle

public void handle(Request request,
                   Response response,
                   MiddlewareChain chain)
            throws Exception
Description copied from interface: Middleware
This method is called by Jogger when a request arrives. Notice that the implementation has to call MiddlewareChain.next() to execute the next middlewares.

Specified by:
handle in interface Middleware
Parameters:
request - the Jogger HTTP request.
response - the Jogger HTTP response.
chain - an object used to call the next middleware.
Throws:
Exception

getRoutes

public List<Route> getRoutes()

setRoutes

public void setRoutes(List<Route> routes)

addRoute

public void addRoute(Route route)
Adds a route to the list of routes using a Route object.

Parameters:
route - the route to be added.

addRoute

public void addRoute(Route.HttpMethod httpMethod,
                     String path,
                     Object controller,
                     String methodName)
              throws NoSuchMethodException
Creates a Route object from the received arguments and adds it to the list of routes.

Parameters:
httpMethod - the HTTP method to which this route is going to respond.
path - the path to which this route is going to respond.
controller - the object that will be invoked when this route matches.
methodName - the name of the method in the controller object that will be invoked when this route matches.
Throws:
NoSuchMethodException - if the methodName is not found or doesn't have the right signature.

addRoute

public void addRoute(Route.HttpMethod httpMethod,
                     String path,
                     Object controller,
                     Method method)
Creates a Route object from the received arguments and adds it to the list of routes.

Parameters:
httpMethod - the HTTP method to which this route is going to respond.
path - the path to which this route is going to respond.
controller - the object that will be invoked when this route matches.
method - the Method that will be invoked when this route matches.

get

public void get(String path,
                RouteHandler handler)
Creates a Route object and adds it to the routes list. It will respond to the GET HTTP method and the specified path invoking the RouteHandler object.

Parameters:
path - the path to which this route will respond.
handler - the object that will be invoked when the route matches.

post

public void post(String path,
                 RouteHandler handler)
Creates a Route object and adds it to the routes list. It will respond to the POST HTTP method and the specified path invoking the RouteHandler object.

Parameters:
path - the path to which this route will respond.
handler - the object that will be invoked when the route matches.

put

public void put(String path,
                RouteHandler handler)
Creates a Route object and adds it to the routes list. It will respond to the PUT HTTP method and the specified path invoking the RouteHandler object.

Parameters:
path - the path to which this route will respond.
handler - the object that will be invoked when the route matches.

delete

public void delete(String path,
                   RouteHandler handler)
Creates a Route object and adds it to the routes list. It will respond to the DELETE HTTP method and the specified path invoking the RouteHandler object.

Parameters:
path - the path to which this route will respond.
handler - the object that will be invoked when the route matches.

getInterceptors

public List<InterceptorEntry> getInterceptors()

setInterceptors

public void setInterceptors(List<InterceptorEntry> interceptors)

addInterceptor

public void addInterceptor(Interceptor interceptor,
                           String... paths)
Adds the interceptor to the list of interceptors that will matches the specified paths.

Parameters:
interceptor - the interceptor object to be added.
paths - the paths in which this interceptor will be invoked, an empty array to respond to all paths.
